name: kaizen
description: A schematic generator for TypeScript DDD projects

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.cpSync('src/nestjs-module/files', 'dist/nestjs-module/files', {recursive: true, force: true}); fs.cpSync('src/nestjs-module/schema.json', 'dist/nestjs-module/schema.json', {force: true}); fs.cpSync('src/collection.json', 'dist/collection.json', {force: true})"
